thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN De Neuville - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy little getaway
thread.title_full: Cozy little getaway - Review of BEST WESTERN De Neuville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: marouky70
title: Cozy little getaway
text:
Nice little hotel, staff is very friendly the room is comfortable and the bathroom amenity is good, two minutes walk from the subway and RER C ,where u can get connection to anywhere in Paris few stops from pigalle and the Sacre ceur , TV screen with canal + subscription
Transportation service to the airport costs 18 euro
However the elevator is two small barely enough for one person feels scary and old but u can use the stairs instead
